      • Box

        public Box()
        Default constructor. Initializes all instance variables with random values.

      • Box

        public Box(float x,
           float y,
           float accelv,
           float angularv)
        Constructor. Creates a random object at set location
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the object's center (in world coordinates)
        y - y coordinate of the object's center (in world coordinates)

      • Box

        public Box(float x,
           float y,
           float angle,
           float width,
           float height,
           int color,
           float accelv,
           float angularv)
        Constructor. Initializes all instance variables to the values set by the arguments
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the object's center (in world coordinates)
        y - y coordinate of the object's center (in world coordinates)
        angle - orientation of the object (in rad)
        width - width of the object (in world units)
        height - height of the object (in world units)
        color - The color is stored as a single int in hex format
        accelv - the acceleration that will be applied to the existing velocity
        angularv - the angular velocity that will turn the object

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(float x,
                        float y)
        Performs a hierarchical search to determine whether the point received as parameter is inside the face.
        Specified by:
        isInside in class GraphicObject
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of a point in the world reference frame
        y - y coordinate of a point in the world reference frame
        Returns:
        true if the point at (x, y) lies inside this face object.
